column4: I was installing the latest Emacs and hit a snag. http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/d603a48cd  The problem is I can't find the files it's looking for.  Any help will be appreciated.
hi. i wish it showed exactly what library it wants, the actual name. hang on, i might be able to come up with something to try
i'm not sure if this is what you need or not, but you can try installing it --> libx11-dev
